messages.message:
Hey all, please join in for @kunal and @Kai’s Tech Talk on “Control Plane and Deployments_”_ at 8:30am PT tomorrow. They will be giving a deep dive into how Instabase handles releases, uses docker and kubernetes, and the future of deployments and infrastructure management for Instabase.
*When*: Fri 8/12 8:30-9:15am PT
*Where*: Zoom Link (https://instabase.zoom.us/j/96016718024)
*More info and recordings*: Tech talk confluence page (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IB/pages/1263468737/IB+Tech+Talks)
Can we record this? I’d love to attend but have a training session overlapped :/
Yup, it will be recorded! The video will be linked on the Tech Talks wiki page
